name: Paintball War
description: PaintBall War is a multiplayer first person shooter. The world's first full-fledged game associated with paintball. Gain experience, earn new ranks, gain new weapons. Good game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) II X3 455 Processor 3.30 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 1Gb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 Skylake 3.7GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: All
